newsitem.title: USA: Hospital Staffing Q4 shr drops to shr $0.01.
newsitem.headline: Hospital Staffing Q4 shr drops to shr $0.01.

text.p: NOTE: Net results for fiscal 1996 reflect an extraordinary charge of $254,955 (net of tax) which was incurred during the first quarter ended February 29, 1996, in connection with the early extinguishment of the company's perior credit facility and transition to its new credit facility.

Net results for the fourth quarter of fiscal 1996 include a benefit for income taxes of $140,000 resulting from the company's utilization of a net operatiog loss carryforward. In contrast, net results for the fourth quarter and fiscal year ended November 30, 1995, benefited from the recognition of credits for income taxes of $822,570 and $700,570, respectively, associated with certain tax deductible legal settlements.
